title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior: When trying to select an item, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the desired item.

Expected Behavior: The selected item should be highlighted and the focus should remain on the selected item in the library outline view.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the library outline view.
